definition: old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]

sentences.chinese: 這一天是我的舊曆生日。

sentences.english: It was toward the end of July, equivalent to the 'san-fu' period ofthe lunar calendar - the hottest days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 這是七月下旬，閤中國舊曆的三伏，一年最熱的時候。

sentences.english: It falls on the last day of the lunar year and lasts until the Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 它在舊曆年的最後一天到來，一直持續到元宵節。

sentences.english: It is late July, a period in the third hottest-ten in traditional Chinese calendar, and hotter in China than it was.
sentences.chinese: 這是七月下旬，閤中國舊曆的三伏，一年最熱的時候。

sentences.english: The sound of firecrackers can be heard during the Chinese New Year holidays.
sentences.chinese: 在舊曆年假期間常可聽見鞭炮聲。

sentences.english: On the second day of the New Year, Chin and her motherarrived.
sentences.chinese: 舊曆正月初二日琴跟着她的母親來拜年。

sentences.english: That was on June the 4 th , two days after the Dragonboat Festival.
sentences.chinese: 那正是舊曆端陽節後二天，陽曆六月四日。

definition: Teachers' Day (September 10th in PRC and Confucius's birthday, September 28th in Taiwan)
to get rid of the old to bring in the new (idiom); to innovate
Saga county, Tibetan: Sa dga' rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet
3-5 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
9-11 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
Double Tenth, the anniversary of the Wuchang Uprising 武昌起義|武昌起义[Wu3 chang1 Qi3 yi4] of October 10th, 1911/(Tw) National Day
11 pm-1 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
